def isPrime(n):
	if n%2==0:
		return False
	else:
		s = int(pow(n,0.5))
		for i in range(2,s+1):
		    if n%i==0:
				return False
	return True
	
def isPalindrome(n):
	s = str(n)
	return s==s[::-1]
	
N = int(raw_input())
if N%2 == 0:
   N = N+1
while not (isPalindrome(N) and isPrime(N)):
	N = N+2
print N
